text: Dung i dipaodor si Hiskia muse angka pargansion ni malim dohot halak Lepi, mangihuthon pargansionna hian, ganup hombar tu tohonanna, nang malim, nang halak Lepi, laho mamelehon pelean situtungon dohot pelean hamauliateon, asa marhalado nasida, mandok mauliate dohot mamujimuji di bagasan pintu ni joro ni Jahowa.
